hey, the most humble guy here.

so I was looking for tulips in Guwahati

and they told me that it's not the season for tulips

so I thought what can I do for you

and every beautiful thing was ruined by some people in your life

so I have to come up with some new ideas, and I am going to ruin them too,but in a beautiful way

hope you'll stay for the next tulip season,

but for now, I decided to made you this

just a bare minimum effort from my side

hope you'll like it

and stay okay.
